creativecoding.tact

Class TactGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • creativecoding.tact.TactGraph

  • public class TactGraph
extends Object

    A util class to render Tact data diagrams.

    Since:
    0.1
    Author:
    Steffen Fiedler, www.nand.io

        public float width
        Diagram total width.

      • height

        public float height
        Diagram total height.

      • offsetX

        public float offsetX
        Graph offset on the left side of the diagram. This value represents the distance between the left side of the bounding box and the y-axis in pixel.

      • offsetY

        public float offsetY
        Graph offset on the bottom side of the diagram. This value represents the distance between the bottom side of the bounding box an the x-axis in pixel.

      • displayGuides

        public boolean displayGuides
        Flag for displaying background guides in graph area.

      • displayAxis

        public boolean displayAxis
        Flag for showing and hiding diagram axes.

      • displayTitle

        public boolean displayTitle
        Flag for showing and hiding diagram title caption.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TactGraph

        public TactGraph(PApplet parent,
                 float x,
                 float y,
                 float width,
                 float height)
        Creates a graph plotting helper instance. The aim of this class is to provide simple access to TactSensor related diagram drawing functionality.
        Parameters:
        parent - Processing sketch instance
        x - diagram x position
        y - diagram y position
        width - diagram total width
        height - diagram total height
        Since:
        0.1

    • Method Detail

      • spectrum

        public void spectrum(TactSensor sensor,
                     int bins)
        Renders TactSpectrum within the given diagram dimensions. Define a bin resolution for also plotting the signal in groups of n-bins, whereby n must be power of two; not exceeding the length of the TactSpectrum.
        Parameters:
        sensor - sensor source for retrieving latest spectrum from
        bins - number of groups the signal shall be segmented into. This value must be power of two and shall not exceede the total amount of spectrum values.
        Since:
        0.1
        See Also:
        TactSpectrum.values, TactSpectrum.bins(int)

      • spectrum

        public void spectrum(TactSpectrum spectrum,
                     int bins)
        Renders TactSpectrum within the given diagram dimensions. Define a bin resolution for also plotting the signal in groups of n-bins, whereby n must be power of two; not exceeding the length of the TactSpectrum.
        For also plotting the min- and maxima bounds, use the spectrum(TactSensor) version of this method.
        Parameters:
        spectrum - to plot as diagram.
        bins - number of groups to simplify signal.
        Since:
        0.1
        See Also:
        TactSpectrum.values, TactSpectrum.bins(int)

      • spectrum

        public void spectrum(TactSensor sensor)
        Renders TactSpectrum within the given diagram dimension.
        Parameters:
        sensor - source for retrieving latest spectrum.
        Since:
        0.1
        See Also:
        TactSpectrum.values

      • spectrum

        public void spectrum(TactSpectrum spectrum)
        Renders TactSpectrum within the given diagram dimensions. For also plotting the min- and maxima bounds, use the spectrum(TactSensor) version of this method.
        Parameters:
        spectrum - to plot as diagram.
        Since:
        0.1
        See Also:
        TactSpectrum.values

      • bias

        public void bias(TactSensor sensor)
        Renders bias histogram of a given TactSpectrum.
        Parameters:
        sensor - sensor holding the array of chronological bias values.
        Since:
        0.1
        See Also:
        TactSensor.bias

      • graph

        public void graph(float[] values,
                  float xMin,
                  float xMax,
                  float yMin,
                  float yMax)
        Renders graph for given values set.
        Parameters:
        values - list of single values to render.
        xMin - the minimum value on the x-axis.
        xMax - the maximum value on the x-axis.
        yMin - the minimum value on the y-axis.
        yMax - the maximum value on the y-axis.
        Since:
        0.1

      • bins

        public void bins(float[][] values,
                 float yMin,
                 float yMax)
        Renders signal spectrum grouped into bins.
        Parameters:
        values - of the graph that is to plot.
        yMin - the minimum value on the y-axis.
        yMax - the maximum value on the y-axis.
        Since:
        0.1
